text: Eduardo Junqueira Sales also known as Edu Sales (born 13 December 1977 in São Paulo) is a former Brazilian football player who played as midfielder. ==External links== * Player profile * * Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:US Créteil-Lusitanos players Category:C.D.
